title: BACKYARD / KIM APT DOOR barks
description: Kim barks after you discover that the door is locked.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There must be another way into the..."
dialogueTree.english: "There must be another way into the building."
dialogueTree.polish: „Musi być jakiś inny sposób, aby dostać się do budynku”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Мусіць быць нейкі іншы спосаб, каб трапіць у будынак».
